graph_title: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
indicator_name: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
SDG_GOAL: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_TARGET: Target 1.5: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their  exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 1.5.1: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population - modified to report number for state
STAT_CONC_DEF:
## Limitations:
This information is not reported for the city so has to be modified to be reported the death and injured count by state.
